tool_description: Creates customized consultation questionnaires based on event type and service level to gather comprehensive client requirements.

event_type.description: Type of event for questionnaire customization

error_messages: Invalid event type: Provide a valid event type for questionnaire generation
Invalid service level: Use one of [basic, standard, premium, luxury]
usage: Specify event_type and service_level to generate a tailored questionnaire for client consultation sessions.

questions.description: List of customized questions for the client
